entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • runtime-community: Failure to build System.Security.Cryptography.Native/opensslshim.c due to overflow in expression with type long #104333
  • Investigate ILLink asserts in android scenarios #104331
    9.0.0
  • SPMI replays missing on arm32 for `CORINFO_OBJECT_HANDLE` JIT-EE APIs #104329
  • docker build --rm -f test.dockerfile . -t img-test : native aot compilation fails on Mac M1 in version 9, ok in version 8 #104325
  • HttpClient (using SocketsHttpHandler) may cause unobserved IOException that cannot be caught #104324
    9.0.0
  • Test time out for Loader tests on osx arm64 in gcstress0x3 #104323
    9.0.0
  • `ThreadPoolWorkQueue..ctor` randomly will never return #104322
  • Test time out for global::Test_refarg_f8_cs.App.TestEntryPoint() in gcstress0x3-gcstress0xc #104319
    9.0.0
  • [libraries-jitstress] `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector512Tests.Vector512DoubleEqualsNonCanonicalNaNTest` fails in CI on win-x64 #104317
    9.0.0
  • [libraries-jitstress] `System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.SingleGenericTensorPrimitives.SpanScalarDestination_SpecialValues` fails in CI on win-x86 #104316
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'varDsc->lvLiveInOutOfHndlr' in 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections.SegmentedDictionary` in LSRA #104315
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: AVX-512 pointer overloads for VPMOVZXBD and pals #104314
  • StringBuilder has incorrect (maximum) capacity handling #104310
  • Ensure no component embed the Index/Range source code and reference Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package instead #104308
    9.0.0
  • RPS Regression for DATAS for certain benchmarks such PlaintextMvc #104306
    9.0.0
  • Invalid profiler callbacks on exception handling since .NET 9 preview 3 #104300
  • [API Proposal]: Adding a Cardinality/PopCount property to BitArray #104299
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 6/27/2024 6:42:30 AM #104303
  • ThreadPool.CompletedWorkItemCount double counting IO completion work items #104284
  • Base64url tests fail on s390x (big endian) #104283
    9.0.0
  • Suspected CodeGen Bug in a User-Defined AsyncMethodBuilder #104274
  • [iOS] App crashes with native out of memory error due to memory leak of elements inside a Grid. #104272
  • WasmTestOnFirefox-MT-System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions.Tests.WorkItemExecution failure in CI #104271
  • Reflection API Incorrectly Boxes (U)IntPtr Constants as (U)Int32 #104270

Closed

  • MemoryMappedFile.CreateViewAccessor throws System.UnauthorizedAccessException: Access to the path is denied. #99879
  • ReadOnly Attribute on Directory results in AccessDenied-Exception #98807
  • [Bug Report] SocketAsyncEventArgs will not be collected by GC. Memory Surge #92583
  • Test failure: ERROR: Jit Compiler has wrong version identifier in superpmi-diffs #104327
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CET support #101942
    9.0.0
  • [android] .NET 9 p6, trimmer step no longer saving changes to disk #103987
    9.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandledTester/unhandledTester.cmd #96114
  • Build fail for project in Android [.NET 8] #97171
  • [API Proposal]: Obsolete AVX-512 sign-extended widening to unsigned #104320
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 6/25/2024 5:29:23 PM #104302
  • 'System.PlatformNotSupportedException: The system's ping utility could not be found.' thrown unless running as root on EndeavourOS. #103736
    Future
  • DEREF_AFTER_NULL in /src/coreclr/jit/fgopt.cpp #99476
    9.0.0
  • .NET 9 Arm32 tests are randomly failing from PowerShell hang #104106
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 33 Regressions on 5/3/2024 2:25:46 AM #101990
    9.0.0
  • API Request using Refit and System.Net.HTTP.DelegatingHandler / System.Net.Http.HttpClient fails with System.Net.Http.HttpIOException: The response ended prematurely. (ResponseEnded) and no Inner Exception #104296
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 8 Regressions on 5/4/2024 5:29:12 AM #101989
    9.0.0
  • InternalSetThreadPriority fails if raising priority on illumos #104276
  • [6.0] GSSAPI operation failed - Unspecified GSS failure - Crypto routine failure - Unexpected EOF trying to read request header #95156
    9.0.0
  • The process cannot access the file 'xxxxx.zip' because it is being used by another process #100756
  • Flags enum ToString breaking change in .NET 8? #95617
  • Check new Guid at compile time if available #101517
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] Make CompleteWritesAsync #103434
    9.0.0
  • HTTP/3 connection or stream shutdown is slow #77139
    9.0.0
  • Process terminated. Assertion failed. in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #103911
    9.0.0
  • Blame `dotnet test` - System.IO.FileNotFoundException #104285
  • IAsyncEnumerableOfTConverter<TAsyncEnumerable, TElement> throws OutOfMemoryException when custom JsonConverter involved #102984
  • Failed test: JIT/SIMD/LdfldGeneric_ro/LdfldGeneric_ro (arm64) #104263
  • Matrix4x4IndexerGetTest and Matrix4x4IndexerSetTest failing on native AOT arm64 #104232
  • Implement IAlternateEqualityComparer<ReadOnlySpan<char>, string> on EqualityComparer<string>.Default #102906
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: GC\\Scenarios\\FinalizeTimeout\\FinalizeTimeout\\FinalizeTimeout.cmd #103874
  • Test failure: CoreMangLib/system/span/RefStructWithSpan/RefStructWithSpan.cmd #103624
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid UnobservedTaskExceptions from `HttpConnection.PrepareForReuse` #104335
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Switch uses of `DomainAssembly` that just need `Assembly` to use `Assembly` #104334
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary endianness dependent logic #104332
    area-System.Memory
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #104330
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Add Utf8JsonReader.AllowMultipleValues and related APIs. #104328
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Skip calling not implemented PEAssembly::GetDisplayName in DAC #104326
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Compute EH liveness on all blocks instead of RPO blocks #104321
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Math.SinCos and Math.Exp in Complex #104313
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add support for other same size vector bitcasts to Mono #104309
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [mono] Only ship runtime packs that are classified as mobile targets #104307
    area-Build-mono
  • Clean up procfs.h mess on sunos and illumos #104304
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Turn off USE_REGIONS for sunos and illumos #104301
    area-GC-coreclr, area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Enable QUIC client cert tests on Windows Server 2022 #104298
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add option to install dotnet at .dotnet/$rid #104295
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [WIP] a different way to calculation unusable frag for DATAS #104291
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Lower GetElement on arm64 to the correct access sequence #104288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing break statement #104286
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT/Windows/Arm64: Add TLS inline support #104282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Add ShiftRightArithmeticForDivide #104279
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Need MAP_NORESERVE in VirtualReserve on illumos #104275
    area-GC-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Check values before looping #104273
    area-PAL-coreclr

Merged

  • [HTTP/3] Disable test for ARM #104305
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [NativeAOT] WindowsUse RtlDllShutdownInProgress to detect process shutdown #104318
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update branding to 8.0.8 #104312
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.33 #104311
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert ILLink's usage of dependency analysis framework #104267
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use RtlDllShutdownInProgress to detect process shutdown on Windows #103877
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Optimize Vector128<long> multiplication for arm64 #104177
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • UnixCommandLinePing.cs: improve searching for the system ping binary #103838
    area-System.Net, os-linux, community-contribution
  • Fix DEREF_AFTER_NULL in /src/coreclr/jit/fgopt.cpp #102342
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [workloads] Don't load mono librarymode targets if PublishAot is set #103817
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.8
  • Make randomized string equality comparers implement IAlternateEqualityComparer #104252
    area-System.Collections
  • ARM64-SVE: GatherPrefetch #103826
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Update mono-interp to handle the same Vector.As APIs as mono-jit #104217
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Delete some dead code in finalizer loop #104287
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix typo `the the` #104293
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Part-2:Add runtime assembly code (*.S) files in nativeaot. #104084
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Define SET_SCHEDPARAM_NEEDS_PRIVS on illumos #104278
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Disable flaky Credentials_ServerChallengesWithWindowsAuth_ClientSendsWindowsAuthHeader test at linux #104290
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, test-bug
  • [QUIC] Remove PreviewFeature #104227
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [H/3] Wait for `WritesClosed` and `Dispose` as fire-and-forget #104035
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix potential Debug.Assert in QuicListener #104241
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Implement `IAlternateEqualityComparer<ReadOnlySpan<char>, string>` on `EqualityComparer<string>.Default` #104202
    area-System.Collections
  • [NativeAOT] collect garbage when memory is low #103857
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Added four SVE `CreateBreak*` APIs #104184
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Don't contain the address for Vector_GetElement on Arm64 #104264
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Math.sinh and Math.cosh in Complex #104261
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

Updated

  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `AddRotateAcross` and `AddSequentialAcross` #104258
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Fix type parsing issues in ILLink and ILC #104060
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Make GC stress usable with Libraries tests #103738
    test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • Add standard tags to HttpClient native trace instrumentation #104251
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Arm64/Sve: Rewrite how ConditionalSelect wraps the embedded mask operations #104248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Use the new lock type in TimerQueue #103104
    area-System.Threading
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Support using the system rapidjson to build #101443
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2487295 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Remove uses of CLRJIT_AZ_KEY/clrjit_key1 from SPMI #104164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #103267
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-codeflow
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • STJ: Support serialization callbacks for collection and dictionary types #104120
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Tracing out of proc sampling #104134
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • [HttpClientFactory] Do not log query string by default #103769
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add a disabled-by-default implementation of strength reduction #104243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 + wasi:http #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Detect class inited status more correctly in prestub/jitinterface #104253
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use new [Interceptable] attribute for source gen #104180
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Optimize VectorX<T>.ConditionalSelect for constant masks #104092
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Clean up JSON property lookup logic and add alternate key lookup support. #103836
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Complex.Sqrt comply with IEEE 754 and use double.Hypot #104262
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Improve `JsonNode.DeepEquals` numeric equality. #104255
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Integrate SimdUnicode for AVX-512 #104199
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 9.0.0
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Start Loader contract and implement ISOSDacInterface::GetModuleData in cDAC #104257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Ensure mini-amd64 correctly handles CMP_GT and CMP_GE for OP_XCOMPARE_FP #104206
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Poly fill Index and Range types #104170
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Avoid scanning typeof checks when building whole program view #103883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Obsolete X509Certificate{2} constructors and X509Certificate2Collection.Import #104165
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • update proxy setting on registry changes #103364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Use the same method to generate DllImportAttribute in local methods and P/Invoke forwarders #103973
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Simplify utf8.c #102424
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix coreclr test readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_de… #104140
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disallow not useful configuration combinations #104149
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add support for `SwiftIndirectResult` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104111
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.ConditionalExtract* APIs #104150
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [android] Don't include `JNI_OnLoad` in `libSystem.Security.Cryptography.Native.Android.a` #103231
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • CI test #103646
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Don't use SyncTextWriter in single-threaded wasm builds #101221
    arch-wasm
  • [RISC-V] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Add nativeaot support on LoongArch64. #103889
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-1:Add native code emission module for LoongArch64 #103403
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Console.Unix: revert SetWindowSize implementation. #100272
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
